ja377:1.3: disatā → disā tāta (sya1ed, sya2ed); disā tā (pts-vp-pli1)
ja377:3.2: Dummakkharūpā → dumukkharūpā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); dummukkharūpā (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja377:4.2: Bahussuto ce na → bahussuto neva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja377:6.4: Santiṁ puṇeti → santaṁ puno'ti (bj); santiṁ puneti (pts-vp-pli1)
